attributes.additional_details:
Acton Fire Station has stood proud protecting people of West London since 1938, but has recently been earmarked for closure along with 16 other stations in London due to savage government cuts to public sector budgets.

Please sign this petition to show your support in stopping these savage cuts taking place. If these cuts are implemented, it will inevitably cost the lives of members of the public.

Thank you for your continued support.

FOLLOW US ON TWITTER: @saveactonfire

FACEBOOK: Save Acton Fire-Station
